title: Hoshi wo Katta Hi (The Day I Bought a Star)
synopsis: A young boy, tired of the city, escapes into the country. When trying to bring vegetables to the market to sell, his cart breaks down and he exchanges the vegetables for a mystical seed. Returning home he plants the seed in a normal potâ€”only to find it growing into a planet.
